website_summaries.verdict: The Wii U-specific additions put a few chinks in the Caped Crusader's costume, but Batman: Arkham City - Armored Edition is still a great action adventure game.
pros: Atmospheric, fascinating world rich with details and secretsSatisfying, varied, hard-hitting combatGrappling and soaring around the city is thrillingGreat assortment of involving side questsIncludes all the downloadable content from earlier releases
cons: combat mode makes fights less exciting

customer_reviews.title: The Wii U condition is the best!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have played Batman Arkham City for almost all Platforms, PS3 and PS4, but the Wii U version is by far the most enjoyable. This version makes you feel like you are actually Batman nos only bc you get a good use of the Wii U Tab but also the graphics are HD and they did also improve Batman's armor suit and also Catwoman's suit. I highly recommend this game to all Batman and non Batman fans, it's a must buy. Product came in a somewhat dirty condition but not scratched. I cleaned it and it looks new now.
customer_reviews.author: 8bitgamer

customer_reviews.title: great game, gamepad support is awesome
customer_reviews.text: great game, gamepad support is awesome. However, in compairson with some of wii u's other offerings, this game feels like...somethings missing. Maybe its because im playing it years later, but it dosent have that element that the first game had for me. Or the fun factor that most other wii u games had for me. Hell Blops 2 and Assassins creed 4 both felt like different games to me with gamepad support, but this one is just not sucking me in. However, there is nothing wrong with it at all, and I can see how some comic book fans hold this as the holy grail of comic book games
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Simple and convoluted all at once
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it. Fights are a little simple to me - button mash one button. Navigation and player HUD controls are more convoluted comparatively. Not my thing, but there are some cool features controlling bat technology
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: A very good wii u port from xbox/playstation
customer_reviews.text: A very good wii u port from xbox/playstation. Mark Hamill is the Joker - how cool is that? The graphics are great and the story flows really well. My son loves it. It is a little violent as some reviewers complained about and they say "Bi#$*". So keep that in mind if you are getting it for your kids. It is rated T for teen so just be aware.
customer_reviews.author: JAK

customer_reviews.title: Decent Port, w/ minor issues
customer_reviews.text: The game has some performance issues running on the Wii U, with frequent drops in FPS and stutters when it's loading. Other than that, it's a pretty solid Batman game. It's the same old Arkham City with some exclusive features not seen in other versions. A good buy for Wii U owners.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I grew up watching and playing with Batman, so the videos games are right up my alley. I love this game.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Nix

customer_reviews.title: it is a great game, its fun and I like how they ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this game years ago for the other system and repurchased it again for the Wii U.... it is a great game, its fun and I like how they implanted the usage of the game pad... it can be a bit gimmicky, but it here, it works because Batman himself is all about gimmicks.... haha ..
customer_reviews.author: R. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Best version of a great game
customer_reviews.text: This is the best version of this game and I highly recommend it. People have reviewed this in great detail already so I'll just say that if you have an option of buying different versions (360, ps4, wii u, etc) Then this is the one to get. It has a lot of added content. I have it for 360 and Wii U and have played it for PS3... Get the Wii U version. That's not to say the other versions are bad. They're essentially the same game. But this one has a lot more features - including the DLC.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: B-Man
customer_reviews.text: Supports Off-TV play but only supported controller is the gamepad. Definitely worth picking up if you never played this game before. Open world that is fun to explore. Combat gets a little tiresome by the end though. Has a great story and gave me a real appreciation towards batman as a character and gotham as a setting.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Flynn

customer_reviews.title: A fun and exciting game
customer_reviews.text: I first watched youtube video walkthroughs on this game to get a good feel for it; and i will say by doing that it really helped my gameplay. Im not a hard core player, i usually like sticking with mario and racing games. but this was a nice change. it was just hard enough to make is yell at the bad guys but not enough to stop playing..LOL. The graphics are great, the responce time for it is good, and the over all style and story is great. I will say it is a mush have for the wii u or any platform.
customer_reviews.author: T, Shook

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal game, best played on the wii U
customer_reviews.text: I've played this game on the xbox 360 and enjoyed it, but I played it again on the wii u (I don't play the same game twice, but made an exception; it is that good). The wii u's gamepad adds another level to this game that showcases the full potential of the gamepad concept. Being able to view the map on the screen in addition to several other features (guiding the batarang for example), is a lot of fun. Fantastic game on every level.
customer_reviews.author: Theocritus

customer_reviews.title: I loved this game
customer_reviews.text: I loved this game. I enjoyed the gamepad elements and this is one of the few games on the Wii U that utilizes them effectively. Having played this on the PC, the graphics are good but frame rate is not as perfect as my high-end machine. Other than that this version trumps it with some refreshing control schemes. The game itself is a masterpiece on whatever hardware you play it on. Gameplay, voice acting, music, story... all top notch. This is one of those rare games I like to revisit from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Eggster

customer_reviews.title: The best version of Arkham City.
customer_reviews.text: I have Arkham City game of the year edition on the XBox 360 and think it is a great game. Why I bought it for the Wii U, I don't know but I did. The graphics are impressive and the game play is also. I am ok with the tablet functionality and could really do without it. The game plays like it does on the Xbox but looks better. If you don't have this on another system yet, try it on the Wii U. This is the best version.
customer_reviews.author: DJD

customer_reviews.title: Great Wii U Game..
customer_reviews.text: Finding some good Wii U games is sometimes hard to do but when this game came out I was not sure we would like it. it does not disappoint, very cool game to play on the Wii u and the graphics are excellent. We are still playing thru the game, its not a short game. the levels are fun to play and if you like Batman you will like this game. I would recommend Batman Arkham City: Armored Edition for the Nintendo Wii U..
customer_reviews.author: B. Diduro

customer_reviews.title: Good game for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great beat'em up mechanics, just like Asylum, but open world. Problem is that it introduces too many villains too fast and felt kind of messy. Other than that, it is what it is, and that is enjoyable. Not my favorite game in the world but I'd say if you're looking for a graphically appealing, puzzle, beat'em up for the Wii U, I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Stop reading and buy this thing!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite games ever (if not my favorite), once I started playing it I couldn't put the controller down. I was so hooked I had to buy Origins after I finished this one and ended up buying a PS4 just to play Knight. Buy it, you will not regret it. Plus I got it for $11, can't beat that!
customer_reviews.author: elmonero

customer_reviews.title: A gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this to give as a gift. Most people would think this would be a fun game for a teen boy. Nope i got it for a 10 year old girl, yet she seems to love it. She loves the fact that she can change characters and they each have their own special abilities. So she can pass a level and retry it as a different character to challenge herself in the game.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.text: AMAZING GAME!! I've always been skeptical about super heroe games but this one right here is just mind blowing. It makes me remember my childhood watching the old batman cartoon. Now... the wii u edition. It really makes you have a little feel on how Batman feels mid action. They made the right adjustments to the game so it can actually feel realistic. Transaction wise, safe seller. Item as described and if it happens to have another game that I'm interested in i would definetly go to it.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game, bought recently with my wii u, let me tell you that the wii u is a great console, dont listen to the bad publicity, this games has great graphics, and the use of the wii u gamepad is very useful and adds value to the game. The game is one of the best for wii u and it will definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my son in law
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my son in law. He loved it and said it had amazing effects, so he gave it a 5 star
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holy Connundrums, Batman!
customer_reviews.text: Truly excellent game. Never played the original on the 360 but as far as I can tell this edition is just as great, or better. The Wii U game pad can enhance or hinder your experience depending on the situation. At times the remote control batarang motion control was annoying, but you have the option of course of using the joysticks as well. If you are a fan of challenges, collectively, side quest type stuff, and the like this is certainly the game for you! There is a colossal amount of riddler trophies and challenges and tasks to be conquered.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis E. Green

customer_reviews.title: WOW I never thought I would love a Batman game, but.....
customer_reviews.text: I do love this game. The game is better than the Batman movies where the fight scenes are all a blur, but the fight scenes in the game are fun the watch as well as act in yourself. The games dark atmosphere is very effective in getting you in the mood. The Wii U version of the game is very unique due to the gamepad features that are mostly fun to use, see and hear. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Andre R.

customer_reviews.title: It's Batman!! :)
customer_reviews.text: This Game is very fun to play. You explore Arkham City as Batman and solve the crimes and defeat the Villains that reside there. The Game makes great Use of the GamePad to Solve Puzzles and choose Weapons on the Fly. I recommend this game to everyone who loves or new to the Batman Game Series :)
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: The control scheme is fantastic the playability addictive
customer_reviews.text: The control scheme is fantastic the playability addictive. However, there's an unrepairable glitch if u attempt to play Harley Quinn's Revenge a second time. When u approach the first accessible door, it automatically clicks u back the main menu. Also the Wii U processors sound like there straining to keep up w/ the game itself.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Busk

customer_reviews.title: It is one of the Best Games on Wii U and on the Market
customer_reviews.text: It is one of the Best Games on Wii U and on the Market. It is an updated version of the Game of the Year Edition of Batman Arkham City. It includes all of the DLC from the game, the Harley Queen Revenge story, all the Batsuits, and it has new features like the new armored suit that includes the new function B.A.T. mode for fighting, and few new gameplay mechanics for the Wii U Gamepad. Aside from that, its the same game as the GOTY edition. Now, I had seen that the games lags a little in cut scenes, but aside from that its a perfect game with a magnificent soundtrack.
customer_reviews.author: Abner Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as Arkham Asylum
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as Arkham Asylum, but still an alright game. I'll play it when I have nothing better to play.
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Really great game, worth so much to do
customer_reviews.text: Really great game, worth so much to do. The sorry was to notch. 2nd game to pass on my Wii U after Pikmin. Gamepad use is also good. It would of been nice to skip scenes at time and less loading, those are my only complains. I recommend it if you think your library is a little light.
customer_reviews.author: L. Zarco

customer_reviews.title: Epic gameplay and gamepad interactions
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game to experience on the Wii U Gamepad controller. The developers have really thought through the controls and made all the interactions intuitive and fun. The gameplay and story are also epic. Definitely worth a go especially at its current price point. You can't go wrong. Great game to get into if you're just starting to watch Gotham on TV.
customer_reviews.author: BeerBelly

customer_reviews.title: perfect game
customer_reviews.text: The game its pretty cool, its graphics and the map on the wii u gamepad are very useful. I didn't know this game was on the wii u :p
customer_reviews.author: Diego Rivera Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome exclusive features
customer_reviews.text: Awesome exclusive features made replaying this Game on Wii u feel fresh and added some more fun
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Great game, has good graphics, exclusive armor, the gamepad integration is very complete, very interactive . . . Is a game with lots to do, very recomended for the wii u owners . . . Also, it includes all of the DLC! So, great value for this software . . .
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Moreira

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding graphic design. very realistic.... ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding graphic design. very realistic.... My nephew loves the game... me I am more an Atari girl.. I am buying some atari games to play the wii u, I found duck tales.. from my teenage years in the 80's
customer_reviews.author: Nena Marie

customer_reviews.title: It is almost the same as PC but has an improved interface.
customer_reviews.text: This is the same PC version that I already love but it has some nice new features as the batamarang control through the Wii U Gamepad, the controls and the control vibration and sound add a little extra for inmersion. It is a very nice game to play although I am a FPS player myself.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Camargo

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoyed this game
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this game... The Wii U edition is exceptionally good with the new features compatible with the Wii U game pad. This is definitely a worthy purchase for Wii U players.
customer_reviews.author: Easy Coffeedrinker

customer_reviews.title: must-have game for any Wii-U owner
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game! Too bad Wii U lost support from 3rd parties so quickly. The off-tv experience is simply the best way to play. Definitely a must-have game for any Wii-U owner and it plays better on WiiU than PS30 in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pulliam

customer_reviews.title: great and bug free.
customer_reviews.text: Best Batman game ever? Possibly. Not only was it awesome, but I could find no bugs, unlike the prequel.Playing as Batman is fun, and as Catwoman is even more so.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Olson

customer_reviews.title: ... was purchased as a gift and the recipient was happy.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift and the recipient was happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Actually really rather fun! Great graphics, easy to learn game play and all around entertaining and engaging.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Viescas

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: The game is excellent but ez corp is a bunch of scam artists. They sent me a defective game and only refunded my purchase money not shipping until I had to report them through amazon. I really appreciate how amazon thoroughly takes care of some of theses sheisters and I will continue to buy from amazon care free . I contacted Warner bros and they took the defective game and sent me a brand new one Awesome Warner bros and shame on ez corp!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: VERY fun game, just wish I had more time to play, but alas, toddlers need attention too! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Joe C

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this game for the bf because he loves DC heroes. He loves this game and i enjoy watching him play as well. It's like an action movie but your in control. I love playing as catwoman and robin as well!
customer_reviews.author: Denerio

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Wii U game
customer_reviews.text: This game is so far my favorite I play it for two months and I'm not 100% complete and still enjoying the game there are so many ways to take out foes, the only thing that might hinder you in this game is a lack of your own imagination.
customer_reviews.author: gamer 1

customer_reviews.title: Good for WiiU
customer_reviews.text: The gamepad integration was better than expected. I bought this for my husband and he loves it. I also am able to play on the "Easy" level so it's fun for me too. Playing as different characters is a fun twist.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: batman arkham city
customer_reviews.text: does anyone out there remember playing batman on the commodore 64? michael keaton? jack nicholson? well, go ahead and pick up a copy of arkham city ASAP--Gotham needs you! the wii u knocked it out of the park with this one.
customer_reviews.author: casey jonas

customer_reviews.title: Batman At His Best!
customer_reviews.text: The first game that I got through Steam is amazing. The Wii U version of the sequel is something I would recommend. It definitely is a nice polish to the series with the Wii U features added to the game. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Skull13

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A lot of swearing in it, mature scenes, not for little kids.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Just about the most fun I have had playing a video game in recent years. The use of the Wii U controller is so well done that I can not imagine playing this type of game on a different console, even if the other consoles produced significantly better graphics. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: hardcorenerd

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Great game and very well done for the Wii u console. For those who have not played the arkham games this is a great game to start. Although the game relates things to batman arkham asylum. It's does a good job to present the story and gameplay to a new audience.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun game I like the PS3 version better. its fun to electrocute people though.
customer_reviews.author: Sam R

customer_reviews.title: an instant classic
customer_reviews.text: love this game:D been maxing it out trying to get 100% for a while now. storyline was a little short, but maybe that's cause i was having so much fun that time flew by!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: i am enjoying being not the player that gotham needs, but the player it deserves.
customer_reviews.author: tatiana mcdermond

customer_reviews.title: This was a really cool game for the wii u
customer_reviews.text: This was a really cool game for the wii u. They did a pretty good job of utilizing the game pad, which most Wii U games lack.
customer_reviews.author: Sean McC

customer_reviews.title: They enjoy it quite well
customer_reviews.text: Kids have a similar PE addition and play with it quite often so I decided to buy it for their game system. They enjoy it quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Moi

customer_reviews.title: Great Batman Game
customer_reviews.text: One of the best games ever to be released in terms of graphics, story, dialogue, and the plot.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Batan.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great game. The story and side stories are great for fans. Sometimes the city seems rather empty, then again its turned into a prison so not as many people would be around.
customer_reviews.author: Tcullig

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for the Wii U!
customer_reviews.text: It was great to see some of the Batman Games come to the Wii U! This is the definitive version since it has all of the DLC! Hours of content! Higly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Jesionowski

customer_reviews.title: Great game pad features
customer_reviews.text: The best Arkham city version. Great addition of new features specific for Wii U
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Excellent game.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent video game. A solid and intuitive gameplay, a very good story and a lot of replay can guaranty a excellent game.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Graphics are Killer. Gameplay a touch challenging if you're not used to playing these type of games IMO.
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth and sharp looking graphics. Definitely shows off the strength of the Wii U. Like the fact that you start off as Catwoman. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you like the Dark Knight series, you'll love this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch for DLC glitch
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I don't give this 5 stars is because of a programmer glitch. It isn't possible to play the Harley Quinn DLC a second time on the same save file because it boots you to the start screen when you reach a certain pony on the second play through. You can get a replacement disk from WB Games if you email their customer service department and that gets rid of the glitch but you have to pay for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Sleeper

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic game, fantastic for Wii U
customer_reviews.text: Superb gameplay, awesome visuals, fantastic use of the Wii U's dual screens - what's not to like about this? A really excellent game.
customer_reviews.author: Pow

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my spouse. He's very satisfied with the game!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Wii u rules
customer_reviews.text: Great version of a great game. Love the Wii u specific features. Seems like "pro" reviews are overly critical at times. Looks great; plays great; has all the dlc included. Got this from Amazon for $19.99 but would have been happy if I paid more.
customer_reviews.author: Ye Olde Gamer

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: Not easy, but not too easy either. The world is very large and complex. Graphics are nice and controls are easy. Hours of game play. Easy to pick up after work and play an hour or two.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: This item was given as a gift. Arrived in good condition.

customer_reviews.text: the product is of good quality.I hope to continue with you .thank you

customer_reviews.text: Tough game but lots of fun. Son is 11 and I help him along but he loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Works well but
customer_reviews.text: I haven't played much yet but when it's not a character onscreen there is no speech for some reason. May just be that it's glitchy.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Not to bad. I have enjoyed it so far. Nothing to complain about.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game
customer_reviews.text: Great Wii U game. There's not too many great Wii U games so I'll give this one 5 stars.

customer_reviews.title: Great game, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Certainly met my expectations. Lots of gameplay and a good storyline. The integration with the Wii U game controller made the experience even better. Very cool.

customer_reviews.text: this game is great. Lots of action, lots of puzzles, open enviroment, and decent graphics. One of the few WiiU games worth getting.

customer_reviews.title: I played the original on the ps3 but couldn't use ...
customer_reviews.text: I played the original on the ps3 but couldn't use the download codes from Catwoman and such, thankfully this game came to the Wii U with all DLC included.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and awesome game!
customer_reviews.text: This gameplay is really good and the graphics are beautiful! The game is awesome!

customer_reviews.title: It was hillaribossmazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved superheroes, and video games. This game has the perfect mixture of combat, stealth, and great cutscenes and voice acting. I loved it so much and I am glad that the game had the doctor to make the game better. My only complaint about the game, is that robin and nightwing are more badass than batman himself...

customer_reviews.text: Such an awesome game. Superb voice acting and the gameplay was challenging and engaging. If you are a Batman fan, this is a must play.

customer_reviews.text: Wasn't a fan of the brawling system just want enemies to stay down after a few hits

customer_reviews.text: The first Batman game I ever played. Just a great game that I can play over and over.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very enjoyable game and came to me in perfect condition.

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this game. The Armored Edition has been retooled for the Wii U controller. DC has the longest shelf life in the super hero video game genre.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Walton

customer_reviews.title: The Dark Knight goes to Wii U
customer_reviews.text: Almost good as the PC version, but enhanced with the perks of this Wii U Gamepad and with almost all the DLC contents available by its release time. Highly recommended, one of the best titles for this system.
customer_reviews.author: Fredys

customer_reviews.title: It looks amazing! Love all the dlc's are
customer_reviews.text: The gamepad adds a different feel to the game. It looks amazing! Love all the dlc's are included
customer_reviews.author: jackson12

customer_reviews.title: Great Batman game!
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty fun game. I really enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: faustinorojo

customer_reviews.title: awsome game for the wii u
customer_reviews.text: i think its a real awsome game if anyone likes hard games this game is for you or if you just like batman its also like a detective game as well its fun on the back of box it says it has blood but havent seen any yet
customer_reviews.author: douglas borman

customer_reviews.title: bat man arkham city
customer_reviews.text: grand son wanted this and was happy when it arrived, graphic is nice, but cannot voice through out most of the game, this was disapointing to him.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING GAME!!
customer_reviews.text: This is without a doubt one of the funnest games I have ever played! The controls are smooth, the Wii U remote integration is smooth and innovative. Definitely a worthy buy.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Styczynski

product_meta.title: WB Games Batman Arkham City: Armored Edition
product_meta.description: Become the Dark Knight in a genuinely authentic Batman experience with advanced, compelling gameplay on every level, epic super-villain encounters and unexpected glimpses into Batman's tortured psychology
feature_bullets: Become the Dark Knight in a genuinely authentic Batman experience with advanced, compelling gameplay on every level, epic super-villain encounters and unexpected glimpses into Batman's tortured psychology
Play as Catwoman with her own storyline in the main game which is seamlessly interwoven with Batman's story arc
Experience advanced freeflow combat as Batman's melee abilities ratchet up to match that of AI enemies
Put new gadgets, and new functionality for existing gadgets to work that expand the range of Batman's abilities
